# Spells (Alphabetical List - W)
## Wa-We
**[[Wages of Sin (Spell)|Wages of Sin]]****:** Evil creatures attack other evil creatures.

**[[Wail of Doom (Spell)|Wail of Doom]]****:** Deal 1d4 damage/level in 30-ft. cone, plus subjects [[Panicked|panicked]] or [[Shaken|shaken]].

**[[Wail of the Banshee (Spell)|Wail of the Banshee]]****:** Deals 10 damage/level to 1 creature/level.

**[[Wake of Light (Spell)|Wake of Light]]****:** Magical trail aids good creatures, hinders evil ones.

**[[Wake Trailing (Spell)|Wake Trailing]]****:** You can track a ship across the sea.

**[[Walk the Mountain's Path (Spell)|Walk the Mountain's Path]]****:** Subject can move unhindered in rough (rocky) terrain; gains climb speed and +1 on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (v3.5 Jump) checks.

**Walk through Space:** You can spend a move action to teleport 30 feet or to stand while prone without provoking attacks of opportunity.

**[[Wall of Blindness_Deafness (Spell)|Wall of Blindness/Deafness]]****:** Translucent wall blinds or deafens creatures that pass through it.

**[[Wall of Bonespurs (Spell)|Wall of Bonespurs]]****:** Creates a bone wall that can be shaped.

**[[Wall of Chains (Spell)|Wall of Chains]]****:** Creates barrier of woven chains that has 20 hp/4 caster levels.

**[[Wall of Chaos (Spell)|Wall of Chaos]]****:** Wall blocks creatures of opposite alignment.

**[[Wall of Coldfire (Spell)|Wall of Coldfire]]** **<sup>C</sup>:** Deals 2d4 of cold damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 frostburn damage +1/level.

**[[Wall of Deadly Chains (Spell)|Wall of Deadly Chains]]****:** Creates barrier of woven chains that has 20 hp/4 caster levels and deals 3d6 damage to all within 5 ft.

**[[Wall of Deadly Chains, Greater (Spell)|Wall of Deadly Chains, Greater]]****:** Creates barrier of woven chains that has 20 hp/1 caster level and deals 3d6 damage to all within 15 ft.

**[[Wall of Dispel Magic (Spell)|Wall of Dispel Magic]]****:** Creatures passing through a transparent wall become subjects of targeted *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*.

**[[Wall of Ectoplasm (Spell)|Wall of Ectoplasm]]****:** Creates plane or hemisphere of ectoplasm.

**[[Wall of Evil (Spell)|Wall of Evil]]****:** Wall blocks creatures of opposite alignment.

**[[Wall of Eyes (Spell)|Wall of Eyes]]****:** Creates barrier that caster can see through and that paralyzes and consumes those that touch it.

**[[Wall of Fire (Spell)|Wall of Fire]]****:** Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage +1/level.

**[[Wall of Force (Spell)|Wall of Force]]**: Wall is immune to damage.

**[[Wall of Force, Lesser (Spell)|Wall of Force, Lesser]]****:** Wall has 10 points of damage/level.

**[[Wall of Gears (Spell)|Wall of Gears]]****:** Creates wall of moving gears that deals 1d6 damage/2 levels to creatures within 10 ft.

**[[Wall of Gloom (Spell)|Wall of Gloom]]****:** Shadow barrier obscures vision.

**[[Wall of Good (Spell)|Wall of Good]]****:** Wall blocks creatures of opposite alignment.

**[[Wall of Greater Dispel Magic (Spell)|Wall of Greater Dispel Magic]]****:** Creatures passing through a transparent wall become subjects of targeted *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]*.

**[[Wall of Ice (Spell)|Wall of Ice]]****:** Ice plane creates wall or hemisphere creates dome.

**[[Wall of Incarnum (Spell)|Wall of Incarnum]]** **<sup>IE</sup>:** Creates wall of incarnum that deals essentia or Wis damage to those attempting to pass through.

**[[Wall of Iron (Spell)|Wall of Iron]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** 30 hp/four levels; can topple onto foes.

**[[Wall of Lava (Spell)|Wall of Lava]]****:** Wall damages foes that try to enter, periodically launches lava at nearby targets.

**[[Wall of Law (Spell)|Wall of Law]]****:** Wall blocks creatures of opposite alignment.

**[[Wall of Light (Spell)|Wall of Light]]****:** Creates wall of light, can dazzle creatures.

**[[Wall of Limbs (Spell)|Wall of Limbs]]****:** Whirling limbs deal 5d6 damage and grab creatures passing through.

**[[Wall of Magma (Spell)|Wall of Magma]]****:** Deals 2d6 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d6 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 5d6 damage +1/level.

**[[Wall of Nausea (Spell)|Wall of Nausea]]****:** Creatures that pass through the wall are [[Nauseated|nauseated]] and might fall prone.

**[[Wall of Ooze (Spell)|Wall of Ooze]]****:** Creates barrier that has 50 hp/4 levels that paralyzes and deals 2d6 damage to all that touch it.

**[[Wall of Pain (Spell)|Wall of Pain]]****:** Wall causes pain to creatures passing through.

**[[Wall of Salt (Spell)|Wall of Salt]]****:** Wall of salt that can be shaped.

**[[Wall of Sand (Spell)|Wall of Sand]]****:** Wall impedes movement, obscures vision, and blocks some attacks.

**[[Wall of Scales (Spell)|Wall of Scales]]****:** Create a barrier of dragonhide.

**[[Wall of Smoke (Spell)|Wall of Smoke]]****:** Wall of black smoke obscures vision and nauseates those who pass through.

**Wall of Sound:** Sonic wall deflects and damages creatures.

**[[Wall of Stone (Spell)|Wall of Stone]]****:** Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

**[[Wall of Suppression (Spell)|Wall of Suppression]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creates wall that disables magic.

**[[Wall of Thorns (Spell)|Wall of Thorns]]****:** Thorns damage anyone who tries to pass.

**[[Wall of Vermin (Spell)|Wall of Vermin]]****:** Wall of biting pests provides concealment, attacks anyone passing through.

**Wall of Water:** Wall impedes movement and can drown creatures.

**[[Wand Modulation (Spell)|Wand Modulation]]****:** Temporarily change wand to cast another, weaker spell.

**[[Wandering Star Motes (Spell)|Wandering Star Motes]]****:** Outlines subject, produces light.

**[[War Cry (Spell)|War Cry]]****:** Gain +4 on attack rolls and damage rolls if you charge. Any opponent you damage must save or become [[Panicked|panicked]] for 1 round.

**[[War-Mount (Spell)|War-Mount]]****:** Your mount gains a +2 enhancement bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls with its natural weapons; 

     use with other spells grants mount fly speed.

**[[Warcry, Lesser (Spell)|Warcry, Lesser]]****:** Creatures within a 30-foot cone cower for 1d4 rounds.

**[[Ward the Faithful (Spell)|Ward the Faithful]]****:** Creatures of same faith gain bonuses to AC and on saving throws.

**[[Warding Hand (Spell)|Warding Hand]]****:** Hand of force slows opponent.

**[[Warding Gems (Spell)|Warding Gems]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creates gems that store healing energy, encircle the target, and release their healing power on command.

**[[Warding Weapon (Spell)|Warding Weapon]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** The weapon you use for the focus of this spell defends you, 

     allowing you to cast spells without provoking attacks of opportunity.

**[[Warning Shout (Spell)|Warning Shout]]****:** All living creatures within half a mile hear your shout.

**[[Warp Destiny (Spell)|Warp Destiny]]****:** Reverse failed save or hit in combat.

**[[Warp Wood (Spell)|Warp Wood]]****:** Bends wood.

**Wartrain Mount:** Animal gains the combat training general purpose.

**[[Waste Strider (Spell)|Waste Strider]]****:** Move through the wasteland without penalties.

**[[Watchful Ancestors (Spell)|Watchful Ancestors]]****:** Spiritual manifestations prevent you from being flanked and grant insight bonus on one Reflex save.

**[[Watchware (Spell)|Watchware]]****:** Mystical connection warns you if target object has been damaged, moved or touched.

**[[Water Breathing (Spell)|Water Breathing]]****:** Subjects can breathe underwater.

**[[Water to Acid (Spell)|Water to Acid]]****:** Transforms 1 cu. ft./level of water into acid.

**[[Water to Poison (Spell)|Water to Poison]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Transform water into ingested poison.

**[[Water Walk (Spell)|Water Walk]]****:** Subject treads on water as if solid.

**[[Waterproof (Spell)|Waterproof]]****:** Render a touched object or creature waterproof.

**[[Waterspout (Spell)|Waterspout]]****:** Water rises up into a whirling vortex that deals 3d8 damage and sucks creatures in.

**Water’s Blessing:** Grants +5 or higher bonus to [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] checks.

**[[Wave Blessing (Spell)|Wave Blessing]]****:** Keeps one creature/level from sinking.

**[[Wave of Grief (Spell)|Wave of Grief]]****:** All within cone take –3 penalty on attacks, saves, and checks.

**[[Wave of Pain (Spell)|Wave of Pain]]****:** Stuns all within cone for 1 round/2 levels.

**[[Wave Shield (Spell)|Wave Shield]]****:** Water blunts one incoming attack or fire effect.

**[[Waves of Cold (Spell)|Waves of Cold]]** **<sup>C</sup>:** Fire creatures become [[Shaken|shaken]] and cold creatures lose immunity to cold.

**[[Waves of Darkness (Spell)|Waves of Darkness]]****:** Unholy energy inflicts 1d6 points of damage/two levels and other effects.

**Waves of Ecstasy:** Pleasure stuns and staggers creatures.

**[[Waves of Exhaustion (Spell)|Waves of Exhaustion]]****:** Several targets become [[Exhausted|exhausted]].

**[[Waves of Fatigue (Spell)|Waves of Fatigue]]****:** Several targets become [[Fatigued|fatigued]].

**[[Waves of Light (Spell)|Waves of Light]]****:** Holy energy inflicts 1d6 points of damage/two levels and other effects.

**Weaken Powder:** Targeted firearm’s ammunition halves the firearm’s range and imposes a –2 penalty on damage rolls.

**[[Weapon Augmentation (Spell)|Weapon Augmentation]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Weapon gains special ability with up to +3 bonus market price modifier.

**[[Weapon Augmentation, Greater (Spell)|Weapon Augmentation, Greater]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Weapon gains special ability with up to +5 bonus market price modifier.

**[[Weapon Augmentation, Lesser (Spell)|Weapon Augmentation, Lesser]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Weapon gains special ability with +1 bonus market price modifier.

**[[Weapon Augmentation, Personal (Spell)|Weapon Augmentation, Personal]]****:** Your weapon gains special ability with +1 bonus market price modifier.

**[[Weapon Bless (Spell)|Weapon Bless]]****:** Prepare one weapon for combat against a particular foe.

**[[Weapon of Awe (Spell)|Weapon of Awe]]****:** Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

**[[Weapon of Energy (Spell)|Weapon of Energy]]****:** Weapon deals extra energy damage.

**[[Weapon of Impact (Spell)|Weapon of Impact]]****:** As *[[Keen Edge (Spell)|keen edge]]*, but aids bludgeoning weapons.

**[[Weapon of the Deity (Spell)|Weapon of the Deity]]****:** Your weapon gains enhancement bonus and special ability.

**[[Weapon Shift (Spell)|Weapon Shift]]****:** Touched weapon changes form.

**[[Weaponwand (Spell)|Weaponwand]]:** Merge a wand with your weapon, allowing you to wield the wand at the same time you use your weapon.

**Weather Eye:** You accurate predict weather up to one week ahead.

**[[Web (Spell)|Web]]****:** Fills 20-ft.-radius spread with sticky spiderwebs that can [[Grapple|grapple]] foes and impair movement.

**Web Shelter:** Create a comfortable shelter made of webbing.

**[[Webfoot (Spell)|Webfoot]]****:** Target gains +4 on [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] and is less hindered by bog terrain.

**[[Weighed in the Balance (Spell)|Weighed in the Balance]]****:** Harms or heals creatures within 30 feet of you.

**[[Weight of Sin (Spell)|Weight of Sin]]****:** Subject takes damage according to its degree of alignment difference from your own 

     and suffers a secondary spell effect if its alignment opposes yours; repeated use increases severity of secondary effects.

**[[Weird (Spell)|Weird]]****:** As *[[Phantasmal Killer (Spell)|phantasmal killer]]*, but affects all within 30 ft.

**[[Wellspring of Soul's Light (Spell)|Wellspring of Soul’s Light]]****:** Inflicts 10d6 points of damage on all evil creatures and summons one 10th-level paladin/four caster levels.

**[[Were-Doom (Spell)|Were-Doom]]****:** 1d4 creatures are infected with lycanthropy.

## Wf-Wj
**[[Whelm (Spell)|Whelm]]****:** Deal 1d6 nonlethal damage +1d6/2 levels above 1st (max 5d6).

**[[Whelm, Mass (Spell)|Whelm, Mass]]****:** 1d6 nonlethal damage/level (max 10d6) to 1 creature/level.

**[[Whelming Blast (Spell)|Whelming Blast]]****:** 15-foot cone deals 1d6 nonlethal damage/2 levels (max 5d6).

**[[When Two Become One (Spell)|When Two Become One]]****:** Your spirit merges with your horse’s.

**[[Whip (Spell)|Whip]]****:** Creates force whip; crack to keep animals at bay, strike animals to frighten them, or wield like a whip.

**[[Whip of Ants (Spell)|Whip of Ants]]:** Create a whip made of army ants.

**[[Whip of Centipedes (Spell)|Whip of Centipedes]]:** Create a whip made of poisonous centipedes.

**[[Whip of Spiders (Spell)|Whip of Spiders]]:** Create a whip made of poisonous spiders.

**[[Whip of Thorns (Spell)|Whip of Thorns]]****:** Create a thorny whip that can damage or entangle opponents.

**[[Whirl of Fangs (Spell)|Whirl of Fangs]]****:** You create an immobile curtain of snapping, serpent-fanged jaws shaped of pure force.

**[[Whirling Weapon (Spell)|Whirling Weapon]]****:** Hurled slashing weapon magically attacks all foes in 60-ft. line.

**[[Whirling Weapon, Greater (Spell)|Whirling Weapon, Greater]]****:** Hurled slashing weapon magically attacks all foes in 120-ft. line.

**[[Whirlwind (Spell)|Whirlwind]]****:** Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.

**[[Whirlwind, Greater (Spell)|Whirlwind, Greater]]****:** As *[[Whirlwind (Spell)|whirlwind]]*, but larger and more destructive.

**[[Whirlwind of Teeth (Spell)|Whirlwind of Teeth]]****:** Creates moving 5-ft./level cylinder that deals 1d8 damage/2 levels each round.

**[[Whispercast (Spell)|Whispercast]]****:** The next spell you cast can be cast as a purely mental action, provided that it is of 5th level or lower and that you can whisper.

**[[Whispercast, Greater (Spell)|Whispercast, Greater]]****:** The next spell you cast can be cast as a purely mental action, provided that it is of 7th level or lower.

**[[Whispering Flame (Spell)|Whispering Flame]]****:** Communicate between two lit candles.

**[[Whispering Sand (Spell)|Whispering Sand]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Sand delivers your message.

**[[Whispering Wind (Spell)|Whispering Wind]]****:** Sends a short message 1 mile/level.

**[[Widen Auras (Spell)|Widen Auras]]****:** Increase the range of auras bestowed by your class.

**[[Wild Runner (Spell)|Wild Runner]]****:** Change into [[Centaur (Bestiary PF1)|centaur]], gain some abilities.

**[[Willing Sacrifice (Spell)|Willing Sacrifice]]****:** Subject takes 1d10 damage; you gain a profane bonus equal to half the damage.

**[[Wind at Back (Spell)|Wind at Back]]****:** Doubles overland speed of subjects for 12 hours.

**[[Wind Blades (Spell)|Wind Blades]]****:** You harden the air around the target into jagged invisible blades that deal damage based on how fast the target moves.

**[[Wind Tunnel (Spell)|Wind Tunnel]]****:** Ranged weapons gain +5 bonus and double range increment.

**[[Wind Walk (Spell)|Wind Walk]]****:** You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

**[[Wind Wall (Spell)|Wind Wall]]****:** Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

**[[Wind's Favor (Spell)|Wind’s Favor]]****:** Create strong wind for 1 hour/level.

**[[Winds of Vengeance (Spell)|Winds of Vengeance]]:** Gives you the ability to  fly and attack with wind.

**[[Wingbind (Spell)|Wingbind]]****:** A net of force entangles the subject, causing it to fall from the sky.

**[[Wingbind, Deadly (Spell)|Wingbind, Deadly]]****:** As *[[Hold Monster (Spell)|hold monster]]* but only paralyses the wings of a flying creature, causing it to fall. 

     The creature suffers a –2 circumstance penalty to its Will saving throw.

**[[Winged Mount (Spell)|Winged Mount]]****:** Your mount grows wings and flies at speed of 60 ft.

**[[Winding Alleys (Spell)|Winding Alleys]]****:** Trap foe in phantasmal maze.

**[[Winds of Vengeance (Spell)|Winds of Vengeance]]:** Grants flight; attack with wind.

**[[Wingblast (Spell)|Wingblast]]****:** Create wings that can transform into a *[[Gust of Wind (Spell)|gust of wind]]* or *[[Obscuring Mist (Spell)|obscuring mist]]*.

**[[Winged Arrows (Spell)|Winged Arrows]]****:** Ranged weapon attacks ignore range penalties or gain +2 bonus.

**[[Winged Watcher (Spell)|Winged Watcher]]****:** Take the form of a bird.

**[[Wings of Air (Spell)|Wings of Air]]****:** Subject’s flight maneuverability improves by one step.

**[[Wings of Air, Greater (Spell)|Wings of Air, Greater]]****:** Subject’s flight maneuverability improves by two steps.

**[[Wings of Bounding (Spell)|Wings of Bounding]]****:** Get a +20 circumstance bonus on a [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (v3.5 Jump) check.

**[[Wings of Cover (Spell)|Wings of Cover]]****:** Grant cover against a specific attack.

**[[Wings of Flurry (Spell)|Wings of Flurry]]****:** Your wings of force can attack all foes within 30 ft.

**[[Wings of Swift Flying (Spell)|Wings of Swift Flying]]****:** Increase your temporary fly speed by 30 ft.

**[[Wings of the Sea (Spell)|Wings of the Sea]]****:** +30 ft. to subject’s swim speed.

**[[Winter Chill (Spell)|Winter Chill]]****:** Creature takes 1d6 cold damage and is [[Fatigued|fatigued]].

**[[Winter's Embrace (Spell)|Winter’s Embrace]]****:** Creature takes 1d8 cold damage/round and might become [[Exhausted|exhausted]].

**[[Wish (Spell)|Wish]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Limited Wish (Spell)|limited wish]]*, but with fewer limits.

**[[Wither (Spell)|Wither]]****:** Deals 1d6/level dessication damage and dehydrates living creature.

**Wither Limb:** Caster reduces subject’s speed to 5 ft. or makes it impossible for subject to use objects or cast somatic spells.

**[[Withering Palm (Spell)|Withering Palm]]****:** Touch attack deals 1 point Str damage plus 1 point Con damage/2 levels.

**Witness:** See through the target’s eyes and ears.

## Wk-Wo
**[[Wolf's Form (Spell)|Wolf’s Form]]****:** You take the form of a wolf.

**[[Wood Rot (Spell)|Wood Rot]]****:** Destroy wooden items or deal 3d6 damage + 1/level (max +15) to plant creatures.

**[[Wood Shape (Spell)|Wood Shape]]****:** Reshapes wooden objects to suit you.

**[[Wood Wose (Spell)|Wood Wose]]****:** Nature spirit does simple tasks for you.

**[[Wooden Blight (Spell)|Wooden Blight]]****:** Subject turns to wood and takes 1d4/round Dex damage, becoming a wooden statue at 0 Dex.

**[[Woodland Veil (Spell)|Woodland Veil]]****:** Blend unobtrusively into natural surroundings, along with your friends.

**[[Woodwisp Arrow (Spell)|Woodwisp Arrow]]****:** Enables a masterwork arrow or bolt to pass through wood.

**[[Word of Balance (Spell)|Word of Balance]]****:** Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or nauseates nonneutral creatures.

**[[Word of Binding (Spell)|Word of Binding]]****:** Magical manacles restrain foe.

**[[Word of Chaos (Spell)|Word of Chaos]]****:** Kills, confuses, stuns, or deafens nonchaotic subjects.

**[[Word of Recall (Spell)|Word of Recall]]****:** Teleports you back to designated place.

**[[Words of the Kami (Spell)|Words of the Kami]]****:** Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or dazes Tainted subjects.

**[[World Wave (Spell)|World Wave]]:** Earth moves you across distances.

**[[Worry Free (Spell)|Worry Free]]:** +4 on saves against mind-affecting spells and abilities.

**[[Wounding Whispers (Spell)|Wounding Whispers]]****:** Sonic aura damages foes that strike you.

**[[Woven Bolt (Spell)|Woven Bolt]]****:** Your Eldritch Bolts inflict +1d6 points of damage + 1d6 points/four levels.

## Wp-Wt
**[[Wrack (Spell)|Wrack]]****:** Blinds subject and renders it helpless for 1 round/level, then –2 on attacks, saves, and checks for 3d10 minutes.

**[[Wrack Earth (Spell)|Wrack Earth]]****:** Deals 1d6 damage/level (max 15d6) to creatures in a line and creates a wall of rubble.

**[[Wracking Touch (Spell)|Wracking Touch]]****:** Deal 1d6 damage +1/level; you also deal sneak attack damage if you have any.

**[[Wraithstrike (Spell)|Wraithstrike]]****:** Your melee attacks strike as touch attacks for 1 round.

**[[Wraithstrike, Greater (Spell)|Wraithstrike, Greater]]****:** Your melee attacks strike as touch attacks for 1 round/level.

**[[Wrath (Spell)|Wrath]]:** +1 attack and damage against target creature.

**[[Wrathful Castigation (Spell)|Wrathful Castigation]]****:** Subject dies or is [[Dazed|dazed]] and –4 on saves for 1 round/level.

**[[Wrathful Doom (Spell)|Wrathful Doom]]** **<sup>I</sup>:** Target is [[Dazed|dazed]] and takes damage each round equal to his essentia pool.

**[[Wrathful Mantle (Spell)|Wrathful Mantle]]:** Subject shines and gets +1/four levels on all saves.

**[[Wrathful Weapon (Spell)|Wrathful Weapon]]****:** Grant the targeted weapon one of the following weapon special abilities: *[[Anarchic (MagWpnSpcAb)|anarchic]]**,* *[[Axiomatic (MagWpnSpcAb)|axiomatic]]**,* *[[Holy (MagWpnSpcAb)|holy]]**,* or *[[Unholy (MagWpnSpcAb)|unholy]]*.

**[[Wreath of Blades (Spell)|Wreath of Blades]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Four mithral daggers speed around you, attacking nearby creatures 

     and protecting your spellcasting from attacks of opportunity.

**[[Wreath of Flames (Spell)|Wreath of Flames]]****:** Flames around you deal 1d6 damage to adjacent foes; your melee attacks deal +1d6 fire damage.

**[[Wretched Blight (Spell)|Wretched Blight]]****:** Deals 1d8 damage/level in 20-ft. radius and stuns foes for 1d4 rounds.

## Wu-Wz
**[[Wyvern's Form (Spell)|Wyvern’s Form]]:** You take the form of a wyvern.
